snippet: Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s appointment of an ally as the new central bank chief raises fears that the bank will be subject to political influence.
abstract: Hungarian Prime Min Viktor Orban appoints Gyorgy Matolcsy as country's central bank chief; analysts warn that appointment could open bank to political influence.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s appointment of an ally as the new central bank chief raises fears that the bank will be subject to political influence.

headline.main: Hungarian Prime Minister Cements Control Over Central Bank
headline.print_headline: Hungary: Prime Minister’s Ally to Run Central Bank
